about_the_game:
Race to outsmart a daring opponent who targets only rich people.

This DLC includes the following items:
  • 'Beyond a Joke' Quest
  • Newcomer Outfit
  • Widow's Outfit

The quest is activated by eavesdropping in Grand Saray. The second main quest (A Gilded Cage) must have been completed.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains exploration of crime scenes, depiction of blood.

detailed_description:
Race to outsmart a daring opponent who targets only rich people.

This DLC includes the following items:

  • Widow's Outfit

The quest is activated by eavesdropping in Grand Saray. The second main quest (A Gilded Cage) must have been completed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon R9 380, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
